title: What future technology do you wish we could access today? - Futuristic Technology ✔ - Quora

response.answer_text: ANSWER CREDIT : Gena Kotov It is not an easy way to answer the question, but a general picture of our imagination is based on our subliminal desires. The Future in fact it is our predictions and expectations. What do you expect from future technologies? It is not rocket science to imagine what the future has prepared for us. Today we can see the result of people’s creativity and imagination. Not so long, I've visited GITEX 2019 (tech event in Dubai) and I've seen the enormous number of concepts and prototypes. A picture is worth 1000 words.   On the picture you can see two conditions of the future bike. I wish we could have access to this kind of transport, because it could solve traffic problems, also it looks wonderful and very sci-fi. Yea, I know that it is subjective opinion but for some countries with overloaded traffic it is a solution. . . . . 👇👇 Here You Will Get All The Major Tech Revolutions Taking Place EveryDay .
